post.description: Logs in an existing user and returns a token.

message.example: These credentials do not match our records.

post.description: Registers a new user and returns the user object.
Revokes the current user's authentication token.

post.summary: Add a product to the cart
post.description: Menambahkan produk ke keranjang belanja user yang sedang login.

get.description: Mengambil semua product di cart berdasarkan user id.

delete.summary: Remove a product from the cart
delete.description: Menghapus produk dari keranjang belanja berdasarkan cart ID.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: ID of the cart item to remove

message.example: Product has been removed from cart successfully.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories.

get.summary: Get all orders for the authenticated user
Get top selling products for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of top selling products for the authenticated user.

message.example: Internal Server Error: Failed to fetch top selling products.

get.description: Returns a list of new in products.

message.example: Internal Server Error: Failed to fetch new in products.

post.summary: Toggle a product's favorite status for the authenticated user
post.description: Toggles the favorite status of a product for the authenticated user. Returns success message and status.

product_id.description: ID of the product to toggle favorite status

200.description: Successful operation - Product removed from favorites

201.description: Successful operation - Product added to favorites

message.example: Validation Error: The product_id field is required.
Internal Server Error: Failed to toggle favorite status.

get.summary: Get favorite products for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of favorite products for the authenticated user.

message.example: Internal Server Error: Failed to fetch favorite products.

get.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category ID.

message.example: Internal Server Error: Failed to fetch products by category ID.

get.description: Returns a list of products filtered by title.

message.example: Internal Server Error: Failed to fetch products by title.
